snippet.title: Illuminator (Logan Ames)
snippet.description:
http://www.l-ames.com/logan/illuminator.zip

C is flashlight (leave it off to overcharge it to kill ghouls), X is action (to pick up/use items, and open/close doors).

You're this kid who's chasing after these ghouls to rescue his kidnapped sister.  The ghouls travel from house to house by tearing through the fabric of space, but they stitch it up afterward.  So you have to find the hole in space in each level, and kill enough of the ghouls that the stitches come undone.
